short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breath easy, and pay with the Pace card

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pay later, anywhere on your desktop.
Split any online purchase into 3 smaller, interest-free payments with Pace Card. With no fees, the Pace Card lets you split the cost of your purchases with more brands.
Together with the Pace Mobile App, you can also stay on top of all your purchases and manage your payments.
Install in seconds, sign in with your Pace account and start shopping.
